question.title: Jira Plugin Dev "ComponentAccessor has not been initialised"
question.body:
When I execute my Jira Java plugin code, I receive the following error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalStateException: ComponentAccessor has not been initialised.

This is not expected to occur on a production system...

I've seen other posts with the same issue, but none of them resolve the problem. Any assistance is definitely appreciated!

Here is the code:

package com.atlassian.ccft.impl;

import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor;
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue;

public class mainCCFT {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        String IssueReference = "CAP-3";
        String customFieldId = "CCFT Forecast Finish";
//      float UpdatedForecastFinish = (float) 41.6;
        
        // Instantiate the issue
//      ComponentAccessor issue = new ComponentAccessor();
        
        // Get the issue
        MutableIssue issue = ComponentAccessor.getIssueManager().getIssueByCurrentKey(IssueReference);
        
        // Get the custom field value
        Object forecastFinish = issue.getCustomFieldValue(ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObject(customFieldId));
        
        System.out.println(forecastFinish);
    }
}

The customField value should be printed out.

Other sites visited include:
ComponentAccessor not initialised

How do I get custom field values in jira?
